title: Patch Notes
content:
Shadow Blade Staggering Smite Toll the Dead

When you succeed a Perception check, the spotted item will now ping on the minimap and be listed in the combat log. Fixed an issue where the special abilities of some of your allies weren't properly provided at the end of the dialogue with them at High Hall. Scrolls and potions inside unlocked containers in your party inventory can now be used when rolling in dialogues. Neutral and friendly NPCs will no longer become hostile when, outside of combat,
